definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Oper outside of the parameters specified in the Electricing Characteristics section is not implied.
sentences.chinese: 建議不要事務在電特性表劃定的參數界限以外。

sentences.english: "urgent" out of ChanXu delimit a single class output and hang express CARDS.
sentences.chinese: “急件”出產需劃定出單班產量，並掛急件牌。

sentences.english: The player takes his or her first stroke at the teeing ground.
sentences.chinese: 玩家需要他或她第一次中風後，在實地劃定。

sentences.english: The key to this type of case is to ascertain the investigation scope.
sentences.chinese: 破獲系列案件的關鍵是正確地劃定偵查範圍。

sentences.english: The precise delineation of those borders must be negotiated.
sentences.chinese: 這些邊界的精確劃定必須以談判解決。

sentences.english: The prohibited area and restricted area specified in the preceding paragraph are defined in accordance with State regulations.
sentences.chinese: 前款規定的禁區和限制區，依照國家規定劃定。

sentences.english: "The islands are a pile of rocks determining where the boundary may be drawn," said Dr. Wu Kang of the East-West Center in Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 那些島嶼就是一堆由邊界劃定在哪裏所定義的石頭。

sentences.english: Chinese government agencies have done an enormous amount of work at delineating the coal.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府機關已經做了大量工作，在劃定的煤炭。

sentences.english: How should be the colour range?
sentences.chinese: 顏色是怎樣被劃定範圍的？

sentences.english: The specific areas shall be delimited by the Municipal City Planning Bureau together with the Municipal Greening Administration.
sentences.chinese: 具體範圍由市規劃局會同市綠化局劃定。

sentences.english: However, in the delineation of property rights has no such balance constraints.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在劃定的財產權利沒有這種平衡的限制。

sentences.english: The different coloured carpet also delineates a 'special' area for the Bee Hive.
sentences.chinese: 不同顏色的地毯也爲“蜂巢”劃定“特殊”區域。

sentences.english: Language development in childhood also requires a remapping of sorts between brain areas.
sentences.chinese: 兒童語言能力的發育，需要重新劃定腦區的功能。

sentences.english: Many of the schools were built with inadequate reinforcements, prompting public outrage.
sentences.chinese: 許多黌舍修建尺度分歧劃定，導致了黎庶的憤慨。

sentences.english: Baked material barrel draw "feeding line", delimit feeding time.
sentences.chinese: 烘料桶畫出“加料線”，劃定加料時間。

sentences.english: The law holds no man responsible for the act of god.
sentences.chinese: 法令劃定人毋爲天災人負責。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
